metadata.title: CVE-2013-1813 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description:
util-linux/mdev.c in BusyBox before 1.21.0 uses 0777 permissions for parentdirectories when creating nested directories under /dev/, which allowslocal users to have unknown impact and attack vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1813` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

busybox - 1:1.22.0-9ubuntu1
busybox-initramfs - 1:1.22.0-9ubuntu1
busybox-static - 1:1.22.0-9ubuntu1
busybox-syslogd - 1:1.22.0-9ubuntu1
udhcpc - 1:1.22.0-9ubuntu1
udhcpd - 1:1.22.0-9ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: busybox package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.22.0-9ubuntu1').
